name: Exfiltration
description:
Exfiltration is a infiltration game project made by students. 

You play as a dumb engineer who wants to leave the laboratory he works at while it's being attacked by terrorists.

Interact with maps to escape the differents levels !

Use your flashlight to stun terrorists and avoid them !

Up : Z

Down : S

Right : D

Left : Q

Interact : E
